S.FORM: alang Davugele ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Tayimari go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 109 buwan, 252 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 79 kyan ku 198 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 21 kyan ku 54 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, . rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Davugele hya' ga Kanadun. tay mkyahu' na Davugele hya' ga Cilalongay. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Davugele ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Davugele ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
